prompts: Create a fierce bug-type Pokemon with sharp claws and a sleek body.
I want an insect-like Pokemon that has a metallic finish and menacing eyes.
Generate a red-winged Pokemon with powerful pincers and agile movements.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of both insect and steel, showcasing its strength.
Imagine a bug Pokemon with a streamlined body and a shiny, reflective surface.
Design a Pokemon with striking red and blue colors, perfect for aerial battles.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies speed and precision, with distinctive scissor-like arms.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile with powerful physical attacks
